interpretation:
Opener:	cannot open
	Denies long suit and weak points

hints.hint0:
0-5: Pass
5-11, 6+: len-4 (weak)
2-11, 6+, 3rd seat: len-4 (weak)
Rule of 20: Suit
13-21: Suit
15-17: 1NT
22+: 2C (Strong)

Major 5+5: 1S
Major 4+4: 1H
Long major: 1L
Minor 4+4: 1D
Minor 3+3: 1C
Long minor: 1L
20-21: 2NT
25-27: 3NT
28+: 4NT
hints.hint2:
<6 pts: Pass
<13 pts
	=6, Q: 2L
	=7, 2 honors: 2L
	=8, 2 of 3 top: 4L
Rule of 20
Balanced
	15-17: 1NT
	Stop all suits

		20-21 hcp: 2NT

		28-29 hcp: 4NT
22+ pts: 2C
